https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ewEq65ITC4juYBFTJYRri7KliV7.jpg Drawn from real life incidents, Bridge reveals the unusual struggle, and the empowerment that comes with it, of a teenage girl residing at the bank of a tributary of the mighty, overflowing Brahmatputra river. Bridge
